name: HENOSIS: Ascension
description:
Henosis™: Ascension is a FREE vertical platformer where you play as a viscous glob of water as you must collect water droplets to survive and reach the portal at the top of each level.

Watch out for nasty enemies and hazards along the way. Score points in each level by beating the Par time, collecting leaves and avoiding as many deaths as possible.

The game is a portable 'lite' spinoff of our debut title Henosis™  which you can download for PC, Mac and Linux.

Donations are welcome! :D

Features:
  • Traverse your way up through 24 hand-crafted levels*.
  • Score points in each level.
  • Unique player mechanics.
  • Original artwork & animation.
  • Dual-Thumb Controls.
  • Localized for up to 11 languages.
  • Ad-FREE!

*Differ from the main desktop version.

Instructions:
  1.  Don't linger.
  2. Collect all drops.
  3. Reach the top!

Use your movement and unique jump ability to circumvent platforms.

Tap ^ to jump when reticle displays.
